src_original: yatas tasya māna ucyate /  etad evonnatisthānaṃ bahvantaraviśiṣṭād alpāntarahīno 'smi na yathābahvantarahīnād iti /  api ca santi kecid ye prakṛṣṭe ca sattvarāśau hīnam apy ātmānaṃ bahu manyante /
tgt_original: 云何卑慢？ 謂於多分殊勝，計己少分下劣，如是心高舉為性。
云何邪慢？ 謂實無德，計己有德，如是心高舉為性。

src_original: aguṇavata iti -- anena hi dānaśīlādyabhāve guṇavattvam abhyupagataṃ bhavatīty ato nirvastukatvān mithyāmāna ucyate //
tgt_original: 謂於尊者及有德者而起倨慠，不生崇重。
云何無明？
謂於業、果、諦、寶，無智為性。

src_original: sā punaḥ [p. 55] sahajā parikalpitā ca /  tatra sahajānyakleśāsamprayogād āveṇikī /
tgt_original: 此有二種： 一者俱生、二者分別。

src_original: parikalpitā vicikitsāmithyādṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarṣādikleśasamprayuktā /  karmaṇy ajñānaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyakarmāstitve yad ajñānam apratipattir anavabodhaḥ ,
tgt_original: 又欲界貪瞋及以無明，為三不善根，謂貪不善根、瞋不善根、癡不善根。 此復俱生、不俱生、分別所起。

src_original: sa punā rāgānukūlaḥ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitādy anusmarato rāgāṃśikaś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何掉舉？ 謂隨憶念喜樂等事，心不寂靜為性。 應知憶念先所遊戲歡笑等事，心不寂靜，是貪之分。
障奢摩他為業。
云何不信？

src_original: śraddhāstitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣv abhisampratyayaḥ prasādo 'bhilāṣaś ca yathākramam /  aśraddhātadviparyayeṇāstitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣvasampratyayo 'prasādo 'nabhilāṣaś ca /
tgt_original: 謂信所治，於業果等不正信順，心不清淨為性。
能與懈怠所依為業。

src_original: vīryavipakṣaḥ /  vīryavipakṣa iti /  vīryaṃ hi kuśalapakṣaprayoge cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,  tadvipakṣatvāt kausīdyam /
tgt_original: 謂精進所治，於諸善品心不勇進為性。
能障勤修眾善為業。
云何放逸？ 謂依貪瞋癡懈怠故，於諸煩惱心不防護、於諸善品不能修習為性。
不善增長、善法退失所依為業。

src_original: kuśalasyānabhilapanateti -- na hi kleśasamprayuktā smṛtiḥ kleśenābhinnaviṣayatvāt kuśalam abhilapituṃ samarthā /
tgt_original: 謂染污念，於諸善法不能明記為性。 染污念者，謂煩惱俱。

src_original: tatropāttāny ātmabhāvaparyāpannāni cittacaittair a[p. 16]dhiṣṭhānabhāvenopagṛhītāni /  viparyayād anupāttāni /  tāni hetur asyety upāttānupāttobhayamahābhūtahetukaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂耳之境，執受大種因聲、非執受大種因聲、俱大種因聲。 諸心心法是能執受，蠢動之類是所執受。
執受大種因聲者，如手相擊、語言等聲。

src_original: anupāttamahābhūtahetuko vāyuvanaspatinadīśabda ity evamādi /  ubhayamahābhūtahetuko mṛdaṅgaśabda ity evamādi //
tgt_original: 非執受大種因聲者，如風林駛水等聲。 俱大種因聲者，如手擊鼓等聲。
云何香？

src_original: ghrāṇasyaiva viṣayaḥ /  ghrāṇaviṣayaś ca gandha eveti pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 謂鼻之境，好香、惡香、平等香。

src_original: samagandhas tu tenendriyamahābhūtānāṃ nānugraho nopaghātaḥ /  sa ca gandhaḥ sahajaḥ sāṃyogikaḥ pāriṇāmikaś ca /  tatra sahajaś candanakuṅkumādīnām /  sāṃyogiko dhūpavartigandhādīnām /  pāriṇāmikaḥ pakvāmraphalādīnām //
tgt_original: 好香者，謂與鼻合時於蘊相續有所順益。 惡香者，謂與鼻合時於蘊相續有所違損。 平等香者，謂與鼻合時無所損益。
云何味？

src_original: ālambane yena cittam abhimukhīkriyate ,  sa cittasyābhogaḥ /  sa punar ālambane cittadhāraṇakarmakaḥ /  cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaścittasyāvarjanam /  etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktam ,  na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇam /  yad apy atra nidarśanam ucyate -- samādhilābhī manaskāralābhīty ucyata iti ,  tatra viśiṣṭamanaskāralābhād eva manaskāralābhīty ucyate /
tgt_original: 任持攀緣心為業。
云何思？
謂於功德過失及以俱非，令心造作。

src_original: anubhayata iti madhyastheṣu /  cittābhisaṃskāra iti manaśceṣṭā /  yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspando bhavati ,  ayaskāntavaśād ayaspraspandavat /  āha ca -- kṣaṇāntarānavasthānaṃ nirvyāpāraṃ yayā manaḥ /
tgt_original: 此性若有，識攀緣用即現在前，猶如磁石引鐵令動，能推善、不善、無記心為業。

src_original: abhiprete vastuny abhilāṣa ity /  abhipretagrahaṇam anabhiprete chandābhāvajñāpanārtham /  evaṃ ca cchandasya pratiniyataviṣayatvaṃ jñāpitam bhavati /  darśanaśravaṇādikriyāviṣayatvena yad abhimataṃ vastu tad abhipretam /  tatra darśanaśravaṇābhilāṣaḥ prārthanā /  yady abhilāṣātmakaś chandaḥ ,  tṛṣṇāchandayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ /  tṛṣṇā[p. 37]abhiṣvaṅgalakṣaṇā /
tgt_original: 愛樂事者，所謂可愛見聞等事，是願樂希求之義。
能與精進所依為業。
云何勝解？
謂於決定境，如所了知印可為性。

src_original: na hy aniścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇasambhavo 'stīti /  yuktita āptopadeśād vā yad vastu niḥsandigdhaṃ tan niścitam /
tgt_original: 決定境者，謂於五蘊等，如日親說：

src_original: tenaivākāreṇa tadvastunaś cetasi niveśanam evam evaitan nānyathety avadhāraṇam adhimokṣaḥ /
tgt_original: 如是決定。 或如諸法所住自相，謂即如是而生決定。
云何念？

src_original: saṃstute vastuny asampramoṣaś cetaso 'bhilapanateti /  saṃstuta ity asaṃstute smṛtyabhāvapradarśanārtham /
tgt_original: 謂於慣習事心不忘失，明記為性。
慣習事者，謂曾所習行。
云何三摩地？

src_original: upaparīkṣye vastuni cittasyaikāgrateti /  upaparīkṣya iti nānyatra /  evaṃ ca samādheḥ pratiniyataviṣayatvam uktaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 謂於所觀事心一境性。
云何慧？

src_original: tatraiva pravicayo yogāyogavihito 'nyathā ceti /  tatraivety upaparīkṣya eva vastuni /
tgt_original: 謂即於彼擇法為性，或如理所引、或不如理所引、或俱非所引。

src_original: evaṃ ca samādhivat prajñāpi [p. 39] pratiniyataviṣayety uktaṃ bhavati /  pravicinotīti pravicayaḥ /  saṃyag mithyā vā saṅkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ /  yuktir yogaḥ -- āptopadeśo 'numānam pratyakṣaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 擇法者，謂於諸法自相共相，由慧簡擇得決定故。

src_original: tena triprakāreṇa yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ /  sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /  tatrāptavacanaprāmāṇyajo 'vabodhaḥ śrutamayaḥ /  yuktinidhyānajaś cintāmayaḥ /  samādhijo bhāvanāmayaḥ /
tgt_original: 如理所引者，謂佛弟子。
不如理所引者，謂諸外道。

src_original: tena yo janitaḥ so 'yogavihitaḥ /  tatra sāṅkhyavaiśeṣikādīnāṃ śrutamayaś cintāmayaś cānāptopadeśajanitatvāt kutarkajanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /  vītarāgānāṃ tu śāśvatocchedavādinām ekatyaśāśvatikādīnāṃ ca mithyāpraṇihitasamādhijanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /  upapattipratilambhiko laukikavyavahārāvabodhaś ca naiva yogavihito nāyogavihitaḥ /
tgt_original: 俱非所引者，謂餘眾生。
斷疑為業。

src_original: saṃśayavyāvartanaṃ tu prajñayā dharmān pravicinvato niścayalābhāt //
tgt_original: 慧能簡擇，於諸法中得決定故。
云何信？
謂於業、果、諸諦、寶等深正符順，心淨為性。
防息惡行所依為業。

src_original: lajjamānasyāpatrapamāṇasya vā kṛte 'pi duścarite 'vaśyaṃ tadviramaṇād anayos ta[p. 45]tsanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //
tgt_original: 謂他增上，於所作罪羞恥為性。 他增上者，謂怖畏責罰及譏論等，所有罪失羞恥於他。 業如慚說。
云何無貪？

src_original: ayam akāras triṣv artheṣu vartate /  abhāve /  'nyasmin pratipakṣe ca /  atra pratipakṣa eva vartate nānyasmin nābhāva iti pradarśanārtham āha -- lobhapratipakṣa iti /  evam adveṣe amohe ca vaktavyam /
tgt_original: 謂貪對治，令深厭患，無著為性。

src_original: nirvid anāgraha iti tatsvarūpanirūpaṇam /  lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca āsaktiḥ prārthanā ca /  tatpratipakṣo 'lobho bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu cānāsaktir vaimukhyaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 謂於諸有及有資具染著為貪，彼之對治說為無貪。

src_original: nirvid bhavabhogādīnavānāṃ parijñānād bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyam /  anāgraho bhavabhavabhogayor asaktiḥ /  athavānāgrahaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ nirvidgrahaṇaṃ -- bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyākāro yo 'nāgraho 'yam alobha iti /
tgt_original: 此即於有及有資具無染著義，遍知生死諸過失故，名為厭患。
惡行不起所依為業。
云何無瞋？
謂瞋對治，以慈為性。
業如無貪說。
云何無癡？
謂癡對治，如實正行為性。

src_original: sarva eva hi kuśalā dharmāḥ kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāravirodhāt pratipakṣa ity ata āha -- bhūtasampratipattir iti /  saṃyagaviparītapratipattibhedāt /  sā punar dvividhā -- jñānaṃ pratisaṅkhyā ca /  punaś caturvidhā vipākāgamacintādhigamanimittā /  pratisaṅkhyā tu prajñaiva dhairyasahitā /
tgt_original: 如實者，略謂四聖諦，廣謂十二緣起，於彼加行是正知義。
云何精進？
謂懈怠對治，善品現前勤勇為性。
除障為業。 由此力故，除一切障，轉捨麁重。
云何不放逸？

src_original: pramādapratipakṣo 'lobho yāvad vīryam ,  yān niśrityākuśalān dharmān prajahāti ,  tatpratipakṣāṃś ca kuśalān dharmān bhāvayatīti /
tgt_original: 謂放逸對治，依止無貪乃至精進，捨諸不善，修彼對治諸善法故。

src_original: pramādo hi yena kleśebhyaś cittaṃ na rakṣati kuśalaṃ ca hāpayati /  apramādena punaḥ kleśān prajahāti pratipakṣāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayatīty ato 'pramādaḥ pramādapratipakṣa uktaḥ /  alobho yāvad vīryam ity alobhādveṣāmohāḥ saha vīryeṇa gṛhyante /  yān alobhādīn vīryaparyantān niśrityāgamya prāpyākuśalān dharmān prajahātīty anena sarve alobhādayo 'pramāda ity uktaṃ bhavati /  akuśalā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāś ca viṣayā veditavyāḥ /
tgt_original: 謂貪瞋癡及以懈怠名為放逸，對治彼故是不放逸。

src_original: viṣayāṇāṃ punaḥ parivarjanena prahāṇam /  tatpratipakṣā ity akuśaladharmapratipakṣāḥ /  te punaḥ kuśalasāsravā anāsravāś ca /  teṣām abhyāso bhāvanā ,  paunaḥpunyena sammukhīkaraṇam /
tgt_original: 謂依無貪、無瞋、無癡、精進四法，對治不善法，修習善法故。
云何捨？

src_original: sa evālobho yāvad vīryam ityādi -- apramāda ivātrāpi vyākhyānam /  cittasamatādibhis tribhiḥ padair upekṣāyā ādimadhyāvasānāvasthā dyotitā /
tgt_original: 謂依如是無貪、無瞋乃至精進，獲得心平等性、心正直性、心無功用性。

src_original: tasyābhāvād ādau cittasya samatā /  tato 'nabhisaṃskāreṇāprayatnena samāhitasya cetaso yathāyogaṃ samasyaiva pravṛttiḥ praśaṭhatā /  sā punar avasthā layauddhatyāśaṅkānugatā ,
tgt_original: 謂依無貪、無瞋、無癡、精進性故，或時遠離昏沈掉舉諸過失故，初得心平等；

src_original: acirabhāvitatvāt /  tato bhāvanāprakarṣagamanāt tadvipakṣadūrībhāvāt tacchaṅkābhāve layauddhatyapratipakṣani[p. 50]mitteṣv ābhogam akurvato 'nābhogāvasthatā cittasyānābhogatā  yayā nirvāsiteṣu kliṣṭeṣu dharmeṣv iti /  yayety upekṣaiva sambadhyate /  kliṣṭā dharmā rāgādisahitāḥ /
tgt_original: 或時任運無勉勵故，次得心正直； 或時遠離諸雜染故，最後獲得心無功用。
云何不害？

src_original: vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ karuṇeti /  vadhabandhādibhir aviheṭhanam adrohaṇaṃsattvānām avihiṃseti vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ /  kaṃ ruṇaddhīti karuṇā /  kam iti sukhasyākhyā /  sukhaṃ ruṇaddhīty arthaḥ /  kāruṇiko hi paraduḥkhaduḥkhī bhavatīti /  iyaṃ cāpramādavat prajñaptita eva ,
tgt_original: 謂害對治，以悲為性。
謂由悲故，不害群生，是無瞋分。
不損惱為業。
云何貪？

src_original: pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu sneho 'dhyavasānaṃ /  sāsravāṇi rūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni pañca rūpavedanāsañjñāsaṃskāravijñānopadānaskandhāḥ /  [p. 51] tatra rūpopādānaskandho dvaidhātukaṃ rūpam /  vedanādyupādānaskandhāś catvāras traidhātukā vedanādayaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂於五取蘊染愛耽著為性。

src_original: upādīyate 'nayā tṛṣṇayā tribhavotpattiḥ paunarbhavikaṃ vā karmeti tṛṣṇāyā upādānākhyā /  upādānasambhūtatvād upādānavidheyatvād upādānāni vā tebhyaḥ sambhavantīty upādānaskandhāḥ /  sneha iva snehaḥ /  yathā hi tailādikaḥ sneho vastrādikam āśrayam anupraviśya vyāpnoti ,  mahatāpi ca yatnena svāśrayād durvivecyaḥ ,
tgt_original: 謂此纏縛，輪迴三界。 生苦為業。
云何瞋？

src_original: sattveṣv āghāta iti /  āghātaḥ sattveṣu rūkṣacittatā yenāviṣṭaḥ sattvānāṃ vadhabandhādikam anarthaṃ cintayati /  sa punar asparśavihāraduścaritasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /  sparśaḥ sukham /
tgt_original: 謂於群生損害為性。

src_original: tena sahito vihāraḥ sparśavihāraḥ /  na sparśavihāro 'sparśavihāraḥ ,
tgt_original: 住不安隱及惡行所依為業。
